attributes.action: Remove Mayor Sadiq Kahn, pro immigration mayor should not be in power in capital
attributes.background: 52% of all voters waned out of eu. 52% of voters wanted to control immigration. The Mayor of our Capital City should refect those views!! Dont let the concentration of immigrants and liberals in london keep this man in power.please!!

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament do not have the power to remove the elected Mayor of London.
